content: Jack Dorsey was replaced by Parag Agrawal as CEO of Twitter in May 2021. Parag Agrawal is an Indian-American computer scientist and technologist who served as the Chief Technology Officer of Twitter before becoming the CEO. Prior to joining Twitter, he worked at Microsoft Research and AT&T Research and published several papers on topics such as databases, distributed systems, and data privacy. Agrawal has a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California, Berkeley. He is known for his leadership and expertise in the field of technology and has been instrumental in driving the growth and innovation at Twitter during his tenure as CEO.
